on that you can think of as Facebook for business. There are users, groups,=
 and news feeds for users and groups. There are also business related objec=
ts of many types.  Interested in getting your opinion on a design question.=

lowers
... there are lots of other child resources under users

=

/object/:id            =
      # get info about the object

   # to get/post/delete feed data

bject/:id                         # get info about the object
